channel.title: 二人 on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in 二人 on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Meeting Mikai in Kawasaki
item.description: ##17:39 Wednesday 19 November 2014 JST## Meeting Mikai at 6pm tonight in Kawasaki. Headed there now from Chigasaki. later Hanging out with them was fun! We talked about John Cage’s As Slow as Possible and some of their upcoming events.
